abstract: Bank of America’s new campaign aims to convince the wealthy that a mass-market institution with a blue-collar image can also manage money for millionaires.
snippet: Bank of America’s new campaign aims to convince the wealthy that a mass-market institution with a blue-collar image can also manage money for millionaires.
lead_paragraph: BANK OF AMERICA will introduce a new advertising campaign next week to convince wealthy people that a mass-market institution with a blue-collar image can also manage money for millionaires.

headline.main: A Bank for the Masses Reaches for the Elite
headline.print_headline: A Bank for the Masses Reaches for the Elite
